info.description: This is the API documentation for Vivu Travel Platform
info.title: Vivu Travel API

post.description: Sends a password reset link to the provided email if it exists
Authenticate a user and return a token
Resets the user's password using a valid OTP token
Validates the provided OTP token for account verification

get.description: Fetch KPI blocks, revenue/new users/subscriptions series, plan mix, top destinations, and recent payments

parameters.description: Relative lookback in days (mutually exclusive with start/end). Default 30
parameters.name: last_days

parameters.description: Bucket size: day | week | month (default: day)
parameters.name: interval

parameters.description: ISO 4217 currency code for labeling (default: VND)
parameters.name: currency

post.description: Add a new day to a specific journey
post.summary: Add a day to a journey

post.description: Add a point of interest (POI) to a specific journey with optional start and end times

parameters.description: Journey ID, POI ID, Start Time, End Time
parameters.name: request

get.description: Fetch detailed information about a specific journey by its ID
Fetch a paginated list of journeys for the authenticated user

post.description: Remove a point of interest (POI) from a specific journey
Update the selected POI in an activity with the given start and end times

parameters.description: Activity ID, POI ID, Start Time, End Time
parameters.name: request

post.description: Create a checkout request for a subscription plan
post.summary: Create a checkout request for a subscription plan

get.description: Retrieve a list of available subscription plans
get.summary: Get list of available subscription plans

get.description: Retrieve subscription details for the authenticated user
get.summary: Get subscription details for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new Point of Interest (POI)

delete.description: Delete a Point of Interest (POI) by its ID

get.description: Fetch a paginated list of Points of Interest (POIs)
Fetch a Point of Interest (POI) by its ID
Fetch a list of POIs by province ID with pagination

put.description: Update a Point of Interest (POI) by its ID

post.description: Process answers for a quiz session
Generate a travel plan based on session ID
post.summary: Generate a travel plan without quiz

post.description: Start a quiz session for the user
Create a new province with the provided name

get.description: Fetch province details by its name
Fetch a paginated list of provinces
Fetch a paginated list of all tags

duration_days.description: computed (inclusive or exclusive—your call; see mapper)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
